has exactly 7 types

values are 1 through 7 (0 is reserved for empty)

has all required actions
has all required states
has correct state progression values

all codes are numbers
defines unique numeric error codes

line clear scores match spec (0, 100, 300, 500, 800)

drop scores are positive
matches spec: 1→0, 2→1, 3→2, 4→4
has entries for 0 through 4 lines

level 0 is the slowest (1000ms)
each level is faster than or equal to the previous

returns correct value for valid levels
returns fastest for level beyond table
returns slowest for negative level

room ID length is 6
